Features At a glanceÔÉÅ

  1. Simplified Registration and Login

  2. Built in Social Network

  3. Cryptocurrency Support

  5. Automatic Updates

  6. Advanced yet simple and elegant User and Admin dashboards

  7. Password Resets

  8. Reset/Change user password from Admin Dashboard

  9. Email Verification

  10. Login with token instead of passwords

  11. Change user password from Admin Dashboard

  12. Block user from Admin Dashboard

  13. Assign Admin Roles

  14. Integrated with Tawk.to support system

  15. Reports and Reports Resolutions

  16. Switch between manual and automatic merging of pledges

  17. Notice Board

  18. Multi Level Referral System

  19. Negotiable Packaging Pledge System over Traditional Type in or Click to Choose
